location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Lieutenant Edward Lowes, Commander of the Ternate

mods.abstract: Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, informs Lieutenant Edward Lowes, Commander of the Ternate, that the packets on board his vessel should be delivered to Thomas Blast, who is travelling as a passenger on board the American ship the Two Sons, which is on her way to Bussora [Basra].
